column5: Welcome to your ideal Texas Hill Country getaway: Take a dip in the lagoon-style pool surrounded by acres of pasture. Enjoy the short walk to the Blanco for a swim in one of the riverâ€™s most scenic areas. Take a basket of carrots to the horses and a make some new friends. Play some vintage records and relax with coffee and a book. Or just sit on the porch glider and watch the longhorns graze amid the wildflowers. No matter how you choose to spend your time here, it will be time worth spending.
